  • Method Details

    • assignLobby

      public static Lobby assignLobby(GameRuleEnum rules)
      If there's already an available Lobby with the same game rules and at least an empty seat it returns the said lobby. If there's no joinable lobby, it creates one fitting the specified game rules.
      Parameters:
      rules - The rules of the wanted lobby
      Returns:
      A lobby with the specified game rules

    • searchGame

      private static Lobby searchGame(GameRuleEnum rules)
      Looks for a Lobby with the specified game rules and at least an empty seat. Returns null if no active lobby is suitable.
      Parameters:
      rules - The rules of the wanted lobby
      Returns:
      The joinable lobby or null if there's none

    • createLobby

      private static Lobby createLobby(GameRuleEnum rules)
      Creates a Lobby with the specified game rules
      Parameters:
      rules - The game rules of the lobby
      Returns:
      An empty lobby with the desired game rules

    • removeLobby

      public static void removeLobby(Lobby lobby)
      Removes a lobby from the list of active lobbies
      Parameters:
      lobby - The lobby to be removed

    • startGame

      public static boolean startGame(Lobby lobby)
      Creates and starts a new game with the users in the lobby and the rules specified at the creation of the lobby
      Parameters:
      lobby - The lobby in which all players all ready and want to start playing
      Returns:
      true if the game started correctly. false otherwise

    • getLobbies

      public static List<Lobby> getLobbies()
      FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY
